images.path: images/Pocket Edition v0.2.1 alpha2 in game.png
images.alt_text: Pocket Edition v0.2.1 alpha2 in game

images.caption: The title screen of the demo version.
The inventory screen of the demo version.

texts.text: v0.2.1 alpha2 was a minor update to Minecraft: Pocket Edition that was released on March 17, 2012. This version was released exclusively on Android devices to fix some of the bugs and crashes in v0.2.1 alpha affecting certain devices. This version was used as the demo version of Pocket Edition for many years.

A Major bug was fixed that prevented the game from opening on some devices.
Acer Iconia Tab A500 fixed
The internal version is 0.2.1(2016), and the size is 2.81 MB.

A demo version of v0.2.1 alpha2 was released on Google Play on August 15, 2012. Similarly, a Lite version was released on the Apple Store on an unknown released date. This was the final version of the Pocket Edition demo. One of the demo's limited features was that your worlds would not be saved, and out of the total 36 different blocks, only 18 were available. The internal version is the same as the full version; however, it is 2.84 MB in size.
